import React from "react"; const PrivacyPolicyContent = () => { return (

Privacy Policy

At VPHomes, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting any information you may provide while using our website. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

1. Information We Collect

We do not collect any personally identifiable information. However, our website may use cookies and third-party tracking tools to analyze visitor activity.

2. Use of Cookies & Tracking Technologies

Cookies help improve your browsing experience by tracking site usage. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not function properly.

3. Third-Party Services

We may use services like Google Analytics to understand user interactions. These third-party tools may collect anonymous data based on your website activity.

4. Data Security

We take reasonable steps to secure any data collected. However, we cannot guarantee complete security against unauthorized access.

5. Children's Privacy

We do not knowingly collect or store data from individuals under 13 years of age.

6. Your Rights & Choices

Users can opt out of tracking services and disable cookies via browser settings. If you have concerns, contact us for further details.

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at:

); }; export default PrivacyPolicyContent;
